name: JOLT: Super Robot Racer
description: JOLT is a fast paced, racing party game. The game at its core is a competitive platformer thatâ€™s all about maintaining momentum with skilful navigation. The players compete to be the last robot standing; using a charged burst of speed called the JOLT, and an array of different objects in the environment.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7.0 Processor: Core i3 3.1 GHz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Radeon HD6870 with 1GB VRAM DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 700 MB available space
